ModMetaData.name: RuntimeGC
ModMetaData.author: Trinity
ModMetaData.description:
<size=20>RuntimeGC In-Game Cleaner</size>
-Remove unnecessary World Pawns to alleviate burden of GameSystem -Clear AvoidGrids to reduce the size of your savegame -Remove useless members(dead or of other factions) in an animal family -Remove filth in HomeArea, and snow -Remove corpses in current map -Remove BattleLog entries -Fix some faction relationships error(Those caused by mod conflicts are not included!) -Re-generate faction leaders to fix some CommTable issues. -Reclaim Memory used by GameSystem to boost up game performance
You can find the original mod description on the steam workshop page.
Latest update: Hopefully fixed error on ClearBattleLog(). Added some error handling to better identify issues. Fixed some (English) translations causing menu item texts to be corrupted.
